waypoints:
local dailycomplete_ptr = 0x9CD1E0 local dailycomplete_offset = 0xACF4 function getDailyComplete() return memoryReadBytePtr(getProc(),dailycomplete_ptr,dailycomplete_offset) end
function getXP() return memoryReadRepeat("intptr", getProc(), addresses.charExp_address, 0) end
function checkDQCount() local _tmpQC = getDailyComplete() cprintf(cli.lightblue,"%s quests completed.\n",tostring(_tmpQC)) if (_tmpQC == 10) then cprintf(cli.lightblue,"Sleepytime.\n") player:sleep() end end
--speedon(59) settings.profile.friends = {"Waterfall Newt","Ruthless Ice Witch"}
-- housemaid player:target_NPC("Nicole Rebecca")

-- other side of bridge
if getXP() > 19000 or player.Level > 21 or getIventoryItemCount("Gazelle Feces") > 70 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("passingThrough1")) end __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("cross"))
__WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("passingThrough")) ==== ======================================================================== ====
if not (player.Current_waypoint_type == WPT_NORMAL) then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("NORMAL") end
if inventory:getItemCount(0) > 4 and inventory:getMainHandDurability() > 80 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("skipMerchant1")) end
player:merchant("Silvershadow Adventurers' Guild Provisioner")
if 10 > inventory:getItemCount("Gazelle Feces") and 19000 > getXP then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("killMoreGazelle")) end
while inventory:getItemCount("Gazelle Feces") > 9 and 10 > getDailyComplete() and 19000 > getXP() and 22 > player.Level do player:target_NPC("Sikas Shorthair") yrest(200) AcceptQuestByName("Gazelle") player:target_NPC("Sikas Shorthair") yrest(200) CompleteQuestByName("Gazelle") checkDQCount() player:update() end
if getXP() > 19000 then if player.Current_waypoint_type == WPT_NORMAL then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType() end yrest(100) else if player.Current_waypoint_type == WPT_RUN then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("NORMAL") end __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("killMoreGazelle")) end ==== ======================================================================== ====
if player.Level > 22 then if player.Current_waypoint_type == WPT_NORMAL then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType() end yrest(100) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("passingThrough2")) elseif player.Current_waypoint_type == WPT_RUN then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("NORMAL") end

if getDailyComplete() > 9 or 10 > inventory:getItemCount("Tortoise Offal") then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("repair1")) end

if inventory:getItemCount(0) > 4 and inventory:getMainHandDurability() > 80 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("skipRepair1")) end

if player.Level > 23 then if 45000 > getXP() then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("mud")) elseif getXP() > 45000 or player.Level == 26 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("rhino")) elseif getXP() > 56000 or player.Level > 26 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("cylotok")) end yrest(100) end -- to Rebecca
